Player History
Hit 3 homeruns against Houston, driving in 5 runs on 6/29/1965...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 7/31/1968 (Going to PIT: P N. Briles, P D. Lemonds. Going to HOU: RF R. Maris)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1969, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/1/1971, off Jack Billingham (ATL)...
Injured on 8/24/1971 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/7/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
